thread.title: Obama Weighs Expanding Background Checks Through Executive Authority
thread.title_full: Obama Weighs Expanding Background Checks Through Executive Authority

author: Kelly Chen
title: Obama Weighs Expanding Background Checks Through Executive Authority
text:
Obama Weighs Expanding Background Checks Through Executive Authority The Washington Post Posted: 10/08/2015 11:10 PM EDT 
In response to the latest mass shooting during his presidency, President Obama is seriously considering circumventing Congress with his executive authority and imposing new background-check requirements for buyers who purchase weapons from high-volume gun dealers.
